data.markdown:
## Figure Description The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a solid black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition. # K 4 CLASSIC ## Text Leicht zu transportieren und schnell zu verstauen: der K 4 Classic-Hochdruckreiniger, inkl. Teleskopgriff, für regelmäßige Einsätze bei mittelstarkem Schmutz. ## Description The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer with several components. The main unit is compact and rectangular with a handle on top for easy portability. It has a hose neatly coiled around the front, and there are two wheels on the side for mobility. The brand name is visible on the top front of the unit. In front of the main unit, there are three separate components: 1. **Spray Gun**: A handheld spray gun with a trigger, designed to connect to the hose for directing water flow. 2. **Two Spray Lances**: - One lance appears to have an adjustable nozzle for varying the spray pattern. - The other lance is likely a dirt blaster, designed for more intense cleaning tasks. The design suggests a focus on user convenience and efficient cleaning, suitable for tasks like washing cars, patios, or garden furniture. The color scheme and branding indicate a well-known manufacturer in the cleaning equipment industry. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1.679-420.0 - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Sehr kompaktes, leicht zu transportierendes und einfach zu verstauendes Reinigungsgerät - Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529041388
Stromart Ph / V / Hz 1 / 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar 20 - max. 130
Fördermenge l/h 420
Flächenleistung m²/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung W 1800
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4,6
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 6,5
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 264 × 256 × 450
## Ausstattung
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch m 6
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugschlauch
Teleskopgriff [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
## Description The image is a logo representing a Guinness World Records badge. It consists of a circular emblem with a blue outer ring and a white inner circle. - **Outer Ring**: The text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" is written in uppercase letters along the top and bottom of the blue ring. - **Inner Circle**: Features a stylized trophy or cup icon in the center, with a star above it. - **Bottom Section**: Below the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in uppercase letters, set against a gold background. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a Guinness World Record. ## Figure Description The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. Adjacent to this number, on the right, is a bright yellow arrow shape containing the text: - **WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE GRAPHIC DESIGNER BRAND** The text is centered within the yellow arrow, emphasizing the claim of being the top brand in freelance graphic design. The use of bold, capitalized letters enhances the impact and visibility of the message. The overall design suggests a focus on leadership and excellence in the field of freelance graphic design. ## Description The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular design. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is prominently displayed. The flag design is positioned above the text, with the black stripe on top, followed by the red stripe, and the yellow stripe at the bottom. The overall design suggests a sense of quality and origin, indicating that the product or item associated with this logo is manufactured in Germany. ### Description of Figure The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon of a power plug with a lightning bolt symbol above it, indicating electrical power or energy. Below the icon, there is a label that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow text. The design suggests an emphasis on increased or full power capacity. The overall theme is related to electricity or energy, with the use of bold colors to convey strength and intensity. ## Description The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable power setting. The nozzle is shown spraying water onto a surface, represented by a horizontal line. Above the nozzle, there is a circular arrow with a plus sign, indicating the ability to increase power or adjust the spray intensity. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. This icon likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the water spray.

chunks.text:
## Figure Description

The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a solid black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition.

## Text

Leicht zu transportieren und schnell zu verstauen: der K 4 Classic-Hochdruckreiniger, inkl. Teleskopgriff, für regelmäßige Einsätze bei mittelstarkem Schmutz.

## Description

The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer with several components. The main unit is compact and rectangular with a handle on top for easy portability. It has a hose neatly coiled around the front, and there are two wheels on the side for mobility. The brand name is visible on the top front of the unit.

In front of the main unit, there are three separate components:

1. **Spray Gun**: A handheld spray gun with a trigger, designed to connect to the hose for directing water flow.

2. **Two Spray Lances**: 
   - One lance appears to have an adjustable nozzle for varying the spray pattern.
   - The other lance is likely a dirt blaster, designed for more intense cleaning tasks.

The design suggests a focus on user convenience and efficient cleaning, suitable for tasks like washing cars, patios, or garden furniture. The color scheme and branding indicate a well-known manufacturer in the cleaning equipment industry.

- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Sehr kompaktes, leicht zu transportierendes und einfach zu verstauendes Reinigungsgerät
- Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529041388
Stromart Ph / V / Hz 1 / 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar 20 - max. 130
Fördermenge l/h 420
Flächenleistung m²/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung W 1800
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4,6
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 6,5
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 264 × 256 × 450

## Ausstattung
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch m 6
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugschlauch
Teleskopgriff [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]

## Description

The image is a logo representing a Guinness World Records badge. It consists of a circular emblem with a blue outer ring and a white inner circle. 

- **Outer Ring**: The text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" is written in uppercase letters along the top and bottom of the blue ring.
- **Inner Circle**: Features a stylized trophy or cup icon in the center, with a star above it.
- **Bottom Section**: Below the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in uppercase letters, set against a gold background.

This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a Guinness World Record.

## Figure Description

The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. Adjacent to this number, on the right, is a bright yellow arrow shape containing the text:

- **WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE GRAPHIC DESIGNER BRAND**

The text is centered within the yellow arrow, emphasizing the claim of being the top brand in freelance graphic design. The use of bold, capitalized letters enhances the impact and visibility of the message. The overall design suggests a focus on leadership and excellence in the field of freelance graphic design.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular design. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is prominently displayed. The flag design is positioned above the text, with the black stripe on top, followed by the red stripe, and the yellow stripe at the bottom. The overall design suggests a sense of quality and origin, indicating that the product or item associated with this logo is manufactured in Germany.

### Description of Figure

The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon of a power plug with a lightning bolt symbol above it, indicating electrical power or energy. Below the icon, there is a label that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow text. The design suggests an emphasis on increased or full power capacity. The overall theme is related to electricity or energy, with the use of bold colors to convey strength and intensity.

## Description

The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable power setting. The nozzle is shown spraying water onto a surface, represented by a horizontal line. Above the nozzle, there is a circular arrow with a plus sign, indicating the ability to increase power or adjust the spray intensity. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. This icon likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the water spray.
